title: pAsi paDarnda taTAkam
sahitya:
pAsi paDarnda taTAkam en manam pAva seyalilE alaiginradE dinam


anupallavi

  AshaigaL ingOr adai aDaiyAviDilO tuyaram adanAl


caraNam    uravu shuzhalgaLil uzhanrAi EdEdO udavA ANavattaip-payinrAi pOdAdO
paraveLiyuil nilaikka muyaluvadun kaDamai oru vazhiyum ariyAdiruppadO maDamai
